original_text: His master saw that the Lord was with him and that the Lord caused all that he did to succeed in his hands.
korean_text: 그의 주인이 여호와께서 그와 함께 하심을 보며 또 여호와께서 그의 범사에 형통하게 하심을 보았더라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord was with him
and that the Lord caused all that he did
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 그가 행한 모든 것을
